name: Dear Home
description:
Venture into a primitive planet as an explorer robot with the special mission to research native species and choose one for a special program of your civilization.

What you will find here:
- Exploration: Travel with your robot through many of the scenarios: grass, mountains and snow;
- Mining: Shape the area around you by mining and collecting resources;
- Crafting: Use the resources you collected for your improvements and to build new stuff;
- Puzzles: Many puzzles to solve while you explore the land.

All of this in small quantities for a welcoming adventure game.
